00011 void    NtupleAnalyzer::MakeHistograms(TString opt)
00012 {
00013                 cout<<"Entering NtupleAnalyzer::MakeHistograms"<<endl;
00014                 //this->Initialize();
00015                 this->SetSamplePreselected();
00016                 this->SetBranchAddresses();
00017                 this->CalculateNumberEvents(opt);
00018                 cout<<"Sample Name: "<<Sample<<endl;
00019 
00020                 TString         Options="6";                    // change this according to
00021                                                                                                         // options used in this function
00022                                                                                                         // (e.g. with/without cb in ariadne).
00023                                                                                                         // Then choose the desirable files
00024                                                                                                         // from ControlPlot
00025                 
00026                 // "3" vs "2": added proper error calculation in negative substracted
00027                 // significance distributions
00028 
00029                 // "4": added q2 bins; now histograms are written to
00030                 // different subdirectories; finer q2 binning; coarser mirr.sign. binning
00031 
00032                 // "5": the binning in h_significance_mirrored and h_significance_chi2 was different, now changed to same (fine) binning
00033 
00034                 // "6": optimization of binning: everything in single loop
00035 
00036 
00037                 TString HistFile=myOutputDirectory+"DIScplots"+Options+".root";
00038                 myFile=new TFile(HistFile,"recreate");
00039 
00040                 TList           *Bins_q2 = new TList();
00041                 Bins_q2->Add(new TBin("q2el",5,20));
00042                 Bins_q2->Add(new TBin("q2el",20,80));
00043                 Bins_q2->Add(new TBin("q2el",80,200));
00044                 Bins_q2->Add(new TBin("q2el",200,10000));
00045                 Bins_q2->Add(new TBin("q2el",5,10000));
00046 
00047                 Int_t           currentBinNumber=1;
00048                 char            DirName[256];
00049                 TBin            *currentBin;
00050                 TIter           Bins_q2_Iter(Bins_q2);
00051 
00052                 while (currentBin=(TBin *)Bins_q2_Iter.Next())
00053                 {
00054                         sprintf(DirName,"bin%i",currentBinNumber);
00055                         myFile->mkdir(DirName);
00056                         currentBinNumber++;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 cout<<"Making histograms......"<<endl;
00060                 cout<<"Start looping"<<endl;
00061 
00062                 while (currentBin=(TBin *)Bins_q2_Iter.Next())
00063                 {
00064                         sprintf(DirName,"bin%i",currentBinNumber);
00065                         myFile->mkdir(DirName);
00066                         myFile->cd(DirName);
00067                         currentBinNumber++;
00068 
00069                         this->CreateHistograms();
00070 
00071                         TH1F * hDebug=new TH1F("hDebug","Debug histogram",20,0,20);
00072                         TH1F * hDebug_secvtx=new TH1F("hDebug_secvtx","Debug histogram",20,0,20);
00073 
00074 
00075                         Int_t           NumberOfZeroZvtxEvents=0;
00076                         Int_t           OutputCounter=0;
00077 
00078                         //
00079 
00080                         for (int i=0;i<nevents;i++)
00081                         {
00082                                 if (OutputCounter==1000000)
00083                                 {
00084                                         cout<<i<<" events processed"<<endl;
00085                                         OutputCounter=0;
00086                                 }
00087                                 OutputCounter++;
00088                                 myChain->GetEntry(i);
00089                                 //if (!(this->IsGoodEvent())) continue;
00090                                 if (!(currentBin->CheckBin(Siq2el[0]))) continue;
00091 
00092                                 hDebug->Fill(1);
00093                                 //____ accessing truth monte carlo info ____
00094                                 if (!Sample.Contains("Data"))
00095                                 {
00096                                         // compare performance of fmckin, "fmckin2" and cbtrue blocks
00097                                         // concerning c/b quarks
00098 
00099                                         Int_t                   cb_event_fmckin=0;
00100                                         Int_t                   cb_event_fmckin2=0;
00101                                         Int_t                   cb_event_cbtrue=0;
00102 
00103                                         for (int k=0; k<Fmck_nstor; k++)
00104                                         {
00105                                                 if ((Fmck_prt[k]>=7)&&(Fmck_prt[k]<=10)) cb_event_fmckin2=1;
00106                                         }
00107 
00108                                         for (int k=0; k<Npart; k++)
00109                                         {
00110                                                 if ((Part_prt[k]>=7)&&(Part_prt[k]<=10)) cb_event_fmckin=1;
00111                                         }
00112 
00113                                         if (Ncb>0) cb_event_cbtrue=1;
00114 
00115                                         FillHist("h_fmckin2VSfmckin",cb_event_fmckin2-cb_event_fmckin);
00116                                         FillHist("h_fmckin2VScbtrue",cb_event_fmckin2-cb_event_cbtrue);
00117                                         FillHist("h_fmckin2",cb_event_fmckin2);
00118 
00119                                         // reject heavy quarks from Ariadne Monte Carlo
00120                                         if (Sample=="inclusive_ariadne_0607p")
00121                                         {
00122                                                 if (Ncb>0) continue;
00123                                         }
00124                                 }
00125 
00126 
00127                                 hDebug->Fill(2);
00128 
00129                                 //__ Secondary Vertexing stuff __//
00130 
00131                                 FillHist("h_nrsecvtxVSnjetA",Kt_njet_a-Nr_secvtx);
00132 
00133                                 for (int vertex=0;vertex<Kt_njet_a;vertex++)
00134                                 {
00135                                         hDebug_secvtx->Fill(1);
00136                                         Bool_t          jetAinB=false;
00137                                         for (int kk=0;kk<Kt_njet_b; kk++)
00138                                         {
00139                                                 if ((Kt_etajet_a[vertex]-Kt_etajet_b[kk])<0.01)
00140                                                 {
00141                                                         jetAinB=true;
00142                                                 }
00143                                         }
00144                                         if (!jetAinB) continue;
00145                                         hDebug_secvtx->Fill(2);
00146                                         Float_t         Significance=CalculateSignificance(vertex);
00147 
00148                                         if (Significance==(-999)) continue;
00149                                         hDebug_secvtx->Fill(3);
00150                                         if (Significance==(-998)) continue;
00151                                         hDebug_secvtx->Fill(4);
00152 
00153                                         Int_t                   ndf=(Vtxsec_multi[vertex]-2)*2+1;
00154                                         Float_t         chi2ndf=Vtxsec_chi2[vertex]/ndf;
00155 
00156                                         FillHist("h_significance_nochi2",Significance);
00157                                         if (chi2ndf>6.) continue;
00158                                         hDebug_secvtx->Fill(5);
00159 
00160                                         FillHist("h_vtxsec_multi",Vtxsec_multi[vertex]);
00161                                         FillHist("h_vtxsec_chi2",Vtxsec_chi2[vertex]);
00162                                         FillHist("h_vtxsec_chi2ndf",chi2ndf);
00163                                         FillHist("h_significance_chi2",Significance);
00164 
00165                                         Float_t         mass=Vtxsec_mass[vertex];
00166 if (mass<1.4) FillHist("h_significance_massbin1",Significance);
00167 if ((mass>1.4)&&(mass<2.)) FillHist("h_significance_massbin2",Significance);
00168 if ((mass>2.)&&(mass<7.5)) FillHist("h_significance_massbin3",Significance);
00169 
00170                                         FillHist("h_vtxsec_mass",Vtxsec_mass[vertex]);
00171                                 }
00172 
00173 
00174                                 // kinematics
00175                                 FillHist("xel",TMath::Log10(Sixel[0]));
00176                                 FillHist("xjb",TMath::Log10(Sixjb[0]));
00177                                 FillHist("xda",TMath::Log10(Sixda[0]));
00178 
00179                                 FillHist("yel",Siyel[0]);
00180                                 FillHist("yjb",Siyjb[0]);
00181                                 FillHist("yda",Siyda[0]);
00182 
00183                                 FillHist("q2el",TMath::Log10(Siq2el[0]));
00184                                 FillHist("q2jb",TMath::Log10(Siq2jb[0]));
00185                                 FillHist("q2da",TMath::Log10(Siq2da[0]));
00186 
00187                                 // electron
00188                                 FillHist("siecorr",Siecorr[0][2]);
00189                                 FillHist("thetael",Sith[0]);
00190                                 FillHist("phiel",Siph[0]);
00191                                 FillHist("zel",Sipos[0][2]);
00192 
00193                                 // event
00194                                 FillHist("xvtx",Xvtx);
00195                                 FillHist("yvtx",Yvtx);
00196                                 FillHist("zvtx",Zvtx);
00197 
00198                                 if (Zvtx==0) NumberOfZeroZvtxEvents++;
00199 
00200                                 FillHist("empz",V_h_e_zu-V_h_pz_zu);
00201 
00202                                 //if (Kt_njet_a!=Kt_njet_b) continue;
00203                                 //if (Kt_njet_b==0) continue;
00204 
00205                                 FillHist("h_njets_AvsB",Kt_njet_a-Kt_njet_b);
00206 
00207                                 //*********** electron jet "finding" ***********//
00208                                 Float_t         Rmin=10000.;
00209                                 Int_t                   jetMIN=-1;
00210                                 Int_t                   electron_jet=-1;
00211                                 for (int jetA=0; jetA<Kt_njet_a; jetA++)
00212                                 {
00213                                         Float_t         eta_ele=-TMath::Log(TMath::Tan(0.5*Sith[0]));
00214                                         Float_t         deta=Kt_etajet_a[jetA]-eta_ele;
00215                                         Float_t         dphi=Kt_phijet_a[jetA]-Siph[0];
00216                                         Float_t         R=TMath::Sqrt(deta*deta+dphi*dphi);
00217                                         if (R<Rmin)
00218                                         {
00219                                                 Rmin=R;
00220                                                 jetMIN=jetA;
00221                                         }
00222                                 }
00223                                 FillHist("h_electron_jet_R",Rmin);
00224 
00225                                 if (Rmin<1)
00226                                 {
00227                                         electron_jet=jetMIN;
00228                                 }
00229                                 FillHist("h_electron_jet",electron_jet);
00230                                 //**********************************************//
00231 
00232                                 // jets (ktJETS A algorithm)
00233                                 FillHist("h_kt_njet_a",Kt_njet_a);
00234                                 for (int jet_nr=0;jet_nr<Kt_njet_a; jet_nr++)
00235                                 {
00236                                         //if (jet_nr==electron_jet) continue;
00237                                         FillHist("h_kt_etjet_a",Kt_etjet_a[jet_nr]);
00238                                         FillHist("h_kt_etajet_a",Kt_etajet_a[jet_nr]);
00239                                         FillHist("h_kt_phijet_a",Kt_phijet_a[jet_nr]);
00240                                         FillHist("h_kt_masjet_a",Kt_masjet_a[jet_nr]);
00241                                 }
00242 
00243                                 // jets (ktJETS B algorithm)
00244                                 FillHist("h_kt_njet_b",Kt_njet_b);
00245                                 for (int jet_nr=0;jet_nr<Kt_njet_b; jet_nr++)
00246                                 {
00247                                         FillHist("h_kt_etjet_b",Kt_etjet_b[jet_nr]);
00248                                         FillHist("h_kt_etajet_b",Kt_etajet_b[jet_nr]);
00249                                         FillHist("h_kt_phijet_b",Kt_phijet_b[jet_nr]);
00250                                         FillHist("h_kt_masjet_b",Kt_masjet_b[jet_nr]);
00251 
00252                                         Float_t         DeltaEta=Kt_etajet_a[jet_nr]-Kt_etajet_b[jet_nr];
00253                                         Float_t         DeltaPhi=Kt_phijet_a[jet_nr]-Kt_phijet_b[jet_nr];
00254 
00255                                         FillHist("h_etajets_AvsB",DeltaEta);
00256                                         FillHist("h_phijets_AvsB",DeltaPhi);
00257                                 }
00258                         }
00259 
00260                         // plot mirrrored significance
00261 TH1F *h_significance_chi2=(TH1F*)(fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_chi2"));
00262                         TH1F *h_significance_mirrored=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_mirrored");
00263 
00264                         Int_t           nbins_significance=h_significance_chi2->GetNbinsX();
00265 
00266                         for (int i=1;i<nbins_significance/2+1;i++)
00267                         {
00268                                 Int_t                   PosBin=(Int_t)(nbins_significance/2+i);
00269                                 Int_t                   NegBin=(Int_t)(nbins_significance/2-(i-1));
00270 
00271                                 Double_t                PosSign=h_significance_chi2->GetBinContent(PosBin);
00272                                 Double_t                NegSign=h_significance_chi2->GetBinContent(NegBin);
00273                                 h_significance_mirrored->SetBinContent(i,PosSign-NegSign);
00274                                 h_significance_mirrored->SetBinError(i,TMath::Sqrt(PosSign+NegSign));
00275                         }
00276 
00277                         //___ for mass bins
00278 TH1F *h_significance_massbin1=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_massbin1");
00279 TH1F *h_significance_massbin2=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_massbin2");
00280 TH1F *h_significance_massbin3=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_massbin3");
00281 
00282 TH1F *h_significance_mirrored_massbin1=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_mirrored_massbin1");
00283 TH1F *h_significance_mirrored_massbin2=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_mirrored_massbin2");
00284 TH1F *h_significance_mirrored_massbin3=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject("h_significance_mirrored_massbin3");
00285 
00286                         nbins_significance=h_significance_massbin1->GetNbinsX();
00287                         for (int i=1;i<nbins_significance/2+1;i++)
00288                         {
00289                                 Int_t                   PosBin=(Int_t)(nbins_significance/2+i);
00290                                 Int_t                   NegBin=(Int_t)(nbins_significance/2-(i-1));
00291 
00292                                 Double_t                PosSign=h_significance_massbin1->GetBinContent(PosBin);
00293                                 Double_t                NegSign=h_significance_massbin1->GetBinContent(NegBin);
00294                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin1->SetBinContent(i,PosSign-NegSign);
00295                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin1->SetBinError(i,sqrt(PosSign+NegSign));
00296 
00297                                 PosSign=h_significance_massbin2->GetBinContent(PosBin);
00298                                 NegSign=h_significance_massbin2->GetBinContent(NegBin);
00299                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin2->SetBinContent(i,PosSign-NegSign);
00300                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin2->SetBinError(i,sqrt(PosSign+NegSign));
00301 
00302                                 PosSign=h_significance_massbin3->GetBinContent(PosBin);
00303                                 NegSign=h_significance_massbin3->GetBinContent(NegBin);
00304                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin3->SetBinContent(i,PosSign-NegSign);
00305                                 h_significance_mirrored_massbin3->SetBinError(i,sqrt(PosSign+NegSign));
00306                                 // here I calculate errors by hand,
00307                                 // adding histograms with sumw2() should give similar results
00308 
00309                         }
00310 
00311                         cout<<"NumberOfZeroZvtxEvents= "<<NumberOfZeroZvtxEvents<<endl;
00312                         fHistToFill->Write();
00313                         // debug histograms
00314                         hDebug->Write();
00315                         hDebug_secvtx->Write();
00316 
00317                         delete hDebug;
00318                         delete hDebug_secvtx;
00319 
00320                         fHistToFill->Clear();
00321                 }
00322                 myFile->Close();
00323                 cout<<"Exiting NtupleAnalyzer::MakeHistograms"<<endl;
00324 }
00325 void            NtupleAnalyzer::CreateHistograms()
00326 {
00327                 // kinematics
00328                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("yel","",30,-0.5,1));
00329                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("yjb","",30,-0.5,1));
00330                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("yda","",30,-0.5,1));
00331 
00332                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("xel","",30,-7.5,1.5));
00333                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("xjb","",30,-7.5,1.5));
00334                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("xda","",30,-7.5,1.5));
00335 
00336                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("q2el","",30,0,5));
00337                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("q2jb","",30,0,5));
00338                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("q2da","",30,0,5));
00339 
00340                 // electron
00341                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("siecorr","",30,5,35));
00342                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("thetael","",30,0,3.2));
00343                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("phiel","",30,-3.2,3.2));
00344                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("zel","",50,-200,200));
00345 
00346                 //event
00347                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("xvtx","",150,1.5,2));
00348                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("yvtx","",50,0.15,0.35));
00349                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("zvtx","",40,-40,40));
00350                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("empz","",30,30,70));
00351 
00352                 // secondary vertexing
00353                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_vtxsec_mass","",50,0,15));
00354                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_vtxsec_multi","",20,0,20));
00355                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_vtxsec_chi2","",50,0,15));
00356                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_vtxsec_chi2ndf","",50,0,10));
00357                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_nochi2","",100,-20,20));
00358                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_chi2","",100,-20,20));
00359 
00360                 /*fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin1","m(vertex)<1.4 GeV",100,-20,20));
00361                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin2","1.4 GeV<m(vertex)<2.0 GeV",100,-20,20));
00362                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin3","2.0 GeV<m(vertex)<7.5 GeV",100,-20,20));*/
00363                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin1","m(vertex)<1.4 GeV",20,-20,20));
00364                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin2","1.4 GeV<m(vertex)<2.0 GeV",20,-20,20));
00365                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_massbin3","2.0 GeV<m(vertex)<7.5 GeV",20,-20,20));
00366 
00367                 /*fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored","",50,0,20));
00368                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin1","m(vertex)<1.4 GeV",50,0,20));
00369                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin2","1.4 GeV<m(vertex)<2.0 GeV",50,0,20));
00370                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin3","2.0 GeV<m(vertex)<7.5 GeV",50,0,20));*/
00371 
00372                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored","",50,0,20));
00373                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin1","m(vertex)<1.4 GeV",10,0,20));
00374                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin2","1.4 GeV<m(vertex)<2.0 GeV",10,0,20));
00375                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_significance_mirrored_massbin3","2.0 GeV<m(vertex)<7.5 GeV",10,0,20));
00376 
00377 
00378                 // ------   J E T S   ------- //
00379 
00380                 // jets A
00381                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_njet_a","",10,0,10));
00382                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_etjet_a","",50,0,50));
00383                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_etajet_a","",50,-3,3));
00384                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_phijet_a","",50,0,6.3));
00385                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_masjet_a","",50,0,10));
00386 
00387                 // jets B
00388                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_njet_b","",10,0,10));
00389                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_etjet_b","",50,0,50));
00390                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_etajet_b","",50,-3,3));
00391                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_phijet_b","",50,0,6.3));
00392                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_kt_masjet_b","",50,0,10));
00393 
00394                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_electron_jet","",50,-2,12));
00395                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_electron_jet_R","",50,0,1));
00396 
00397                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_njets_AvsB","",10,-5,5));
00398                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_etajets_AvsB","",1000,-5,5));
00399                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_phijets_AvsB","",1000,-5,5));
00400 
00401                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_nrsecvtxVSnjetA","",10,-5,5));
00402 
00403                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_fmckin2VSfmckin","",10,-5,5));
00404                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_fmckin2VScbtrue","",10,-5,5));
00405                 fHistToFill->Add(new TH1F("h_fmckin2","",10,0,10));
00406 
00407                 cout<<"Histograms created successfully"<<endl;
00408 
00409 }
00410 void NtupleAnalyzer::FillHist(TString HistTitle, Float_t        Value)
00411 {
00412                 TH1F *currentHistogram;
00413                 currentHistogram=(TH1F*)fHistToFill->FindObject(HistTitle);
00414                 currentHistogram->Fill(Value);
00415 }
